TopicTitle: Introducing the Ability to Embed Imgur Albums!

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Some of you might remember when you used to have the ability to embed imgur albums around and about the Forums via HTML. In the end, we disabled HTML on the Forums as a simple unclosed tag could cause numerous issues, not to mention that there are a fair few security issues that could arise.

So, I realised that we could potentially embed them via BBCode and implemented that today.

To embed your album, simply grab the ID of your imgur album, the following bold text - [noparse]http://imgur.com/a/[/noparse]szz8j, and place that in imgur tags, like so - [noparse]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/noparse].

That will then display your album in the following manner:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

That's about all there is to it, it's pretty simple, have fun!
